divs: sighting detailsi was driving to my nightshift job when an object caught my eye,it was at distance at first maybe 500 to 800 feet away but only 300 - 500 feet in the air.i thought it was a street light at first but it was completely the wrong place, it was its position over the houses that made me give it a second look.it was glowing orange\red about the size of a 5 pence piece and didn't move just stayed motionless above the houses at the side of the road, as i drove past i slowed right down but couldn't stop as i was on a main road.i remember thinking at the time it was a really random thing to see i almost didnt believe i was seeing it.i had never mentioned this to anyone, however two good friend of mine were waiting to for me to pick them up about 3 weeks ago and without any prior knowledge described exactly the same thing i had seen months before.now last weekend a neighbour of another friend asked if we had seen the sun looking object on the horizon the previous night. now these people have met maybe a handful of times and there is no way they could colaberate the story without meeting first and i hadn't told them of my incident until the spoke of what they had seen.
